title: The Grrreat Voice Behind a Christmas Classic
description:
Everyone loves the Christmas TV classic “How the Grinch Stole Christmas.” But few people know the story of the legendary voice-actor behind that beloved signature song. His name is Thurl Ravenscroft. And his daughter Nancy says her dad was anything but grinch-y.

Hear samples of Thurl’s work on Spotify 

Learn more about his life online at  D23.com or on the Disney Wiki
